snippet: Markets were lower after two days of strong gains. The Labor Department’s jobs report said 2014 was the best year for hiring in more than a decade.
abstract: Stocks end lower to cap rough week of trading, decline that comes on heels of big gains in previous two days, inching major indexes lower for 2015; investors signal discouragement due to lack of wage growth in December 2014.
lead_paragraph: Markets were lower after two days of strong gains. The Labor Department’s jobs report said 2014 was the best year for hiring in more than a decade.

headline.main: Wall St. Drops After Jobs Report and Oil Price Slump
headline.print_headline: Markets Slide on Weak Wage Growth
